author's_name_(_зохиогч): BLO BZANG CHOS KYI DBANG PHYUG ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (DUS KYI 'KHOR LO, RJE RIN PO CHE @005A *, ,SOGS BLA MA RNAMS LA GSOL BA 'DEBS SHING 'DOD BYA'I DON LA SMON PA DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG DNGOS GRUB DPAL STER CES BYA BA 'DI NI, 'O YUG 'O BRAN DPAL GYI DBANG PHYUG GI GDUNG RUS KHAL KHA RJE BTZUN DAM PA'I GSOL DPON T'A BLA MA AA CHI THU DAR HAN THON BLO BZANG DKON MCHOG NAS, STON PA, DUS KYI 'KHOR LO, RJE RIN PO CHE, RGYAL DBANG THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA YAB SRAS, SKYABS MGON RJE BTZUN DAM PA, LCANG SKYA RIN PO CHE, RGYAL SRAS RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO, SNYOMS LAS PA DED SOGS BLA MA RNAMS LA GSOL BA 'DEBS SHING, ^RGYAL SRAS RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO'I BKA' DRIN DRAN PA'I GSO BA 'DEBS ZHABS BRTAN, RJES 'DZIN SMON LAM DANG 'BREL BA DANG, GZHAN YANG LAM THUN MONGS PA DANG, THUN MONGS MA YIN LA ^DUS KYI 'KHOR LO'I RIM GNYIS KYI GSOL 'DEBS 'BREL LDAN RNAMS, TSE 'DIR CHOS MTHUN TSE DPAL RGYAS SHING, PHYI MA SHAMBHA LA YI ZHING DU SKYE BA KHYAD PAR RIGS LDAN DRAG PO'I 'KHOR LO CAN GYI 'KHOR GYI THOG MAR SKYES TE, RANG GZHAN GYI DON LHUN GYI 'GRUB PA DANG, SANGS RGYAS BSTAN PA DAR ZHING RGYAS PA SOGS GONG SMOS DON TSANG BA'I @005B 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES, RGYAL SRAS RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN POS LJAGS RTZOM BSKUL MA ZHUS PAR, DER RTZAM NA LEGS PA'I BKA' PHEBS TSUL DAD BCAS PA, MAndAL DANG, LHA RDZAS DRI BRAL GYI RTEN DANG BCAS 'PHRIN YIG GI LAM NAS BSKUL MA MDZAD PA LTAR, BKA' DRIN GSUM LDAN RGYAL SRAS RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO SOGS DAM PA RNAMS KYI ZHABS RDUL SPYI BOS LEN PA'I ^SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG SNYOMS LAS PA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI DBANG GIS, RANG GI BSAM GTAN GYI BSTI GNAS DGE 'PHEL BYANG CHUB GLING DU SMON LAM MTSAMS SBYOR BZANG POS BRIS PA DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
